page.title: 19SPORT & RECREATION IN DUNS.
page.content: THE MOST POPULAR SPORTS IN DUNS ARE FOOTBALL,ATHLETICS & SWIMMING.THE MAIN DAY IS A TUESDAY WHEN SPORTS CLUB MEET AT THE SPORTS COMPLEX & OF OOURSE THE WEEKEND.MOST PEOPLE DO NOT GO WITH THEIR FAMILIES,THEY MUCH PREFER TO GO WITH A FRIEND. DUNS IS LUCKY IN THAT IT HAS MANY FACILITIES FOR PEOPLE OF ALL AGES &ALL ABILITIES.THERE ARE MANY CLUBS IN THE TOWN WHICH ALLOW CHILDREN TO LEARN A SPORT AT AN EARLY AGE AND ENJOY IT FOR MANY YEARS. OTHER TYPES OF RECREATION INCLUDE BADMINTON,WHICH HAS GROWN A LOT IN THE LAST FEW YEARS,TENNIS,BOWLS & RUGBY. LONG DISTANCE RUNNING IS ANOTHER SPORT THAT HAS BECOME VERY POPULAR.IN THE LAST TEN YEARS,THE NUMBER OF PEOPLE WHO TAKE PART IN ORGANISED SPORT HAS GREATLY INCREASED IN DUNS.SPORT ON T.V HAS A LOT TO DO WITH THIS POPULARITY.
